New Roster (Age of Sigmar) [2,000pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Chaos - Khorne) [2,000pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Uncategorised

      • Skull Altar

        Unit Abilities: Witchbane, Words of Hate


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Witchbane Subtract 1 from casting rolls for WIZARDS while they are within 16" of this model.
        Words of Hate You can re-roll prayer and judgement rolls for friendly KHORNE PRIESTS wholly within 8" of this model.

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, BLOODBOUND, HERO, BLOODSTOKER, Leader

        Bloodstoker 6"584+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Whipped to Fury At the start ofyour movement phase, you can pick 1 other friendly KHORNE MORTAL unit whollyn within 8" of this model. Until your next movement phase, you can add 3" to run and charge rolls made for that unit. In addition, until your next movement phase you can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made by that unit. A unit cannot be picked to benefit from this ability more than once per turn.

      • Lord of Khorne on Juggernaut [160pts]

        Selections: 4. Gorecleaver, 6. Disciple of Khorne, General

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, BLOODBOUND, HERO, LORD OF KHORNE ON JUGGERNAUT, Leader, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Gorecleaver, Command Abilities: Blood Stampede, Command Trait: Disciple of Khorne, Unit: Lord of Khorne on Juggernaut, Unit Abilities: Brass-clad Shield, Daemonic Axe, Slaughterous Charge, Weapon: Juggernaut's Brazen Hooves, Wrathforged Axe


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Gorecleaver Pick 1 of the bearer's melee weapons. Improve the Rend characteristic of that weapon by 1. In addition, if the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with that weapon is 6, double the Damage characteristic for that attack.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Blood Stampede You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick up to 3 friendly KHORNE MORTAL units that made a charge move in that turn and are wholly within 16" of a model with this command ability. You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made by those units in that combat phase.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Disciple of Khorne Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this general's melee weapons.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Lord of Khorne on Juggernaut 8"893+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Brass-clad Shield Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model that was inflicted by a spell. On a 5+ that wound or mortal wound is negated.
        Daemonic Axe If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by this model's Wrathforged Axe is 6, the Damage characteristic for that attack is 3 instead of D3.
        Slaughterous Charge After this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of it and roll a dice. On a 2+ that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Juggernaut's Brazen Hooves Melee1"33+3+-1
        Wrathforged Axe Melee1"33+3+-1D3

    • Battleline [540pts]

      • Mighty Skullcrushers [180pts]

        Selections: 3 Mighty Skullcrushers [180pts], Bloodglaive, Hornblowers, Standard Bearers

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, BLOODBOUND, MIGHTY SKULLCRUSHERS, Other, Battleline

        Unit: Mighty Skullcrusher, Unit Abilities: Hornblowers, Murderous Charge, Skullhunter, Standard Bearers, Weapon: Bloodglaive, Juggernaut's Brazen Hooves


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Mighty Skullcrusher 8"563+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Hornblowers 1 in every 3 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run and charge rolls made for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.
        Murderous Charge After a model in this unit makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of that model and roll a dice. On a 2+ that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If this unit has more than 1 model, roll to determine if mortal wounds are inflicted after each model completes its charge move, but do not allocate the mortal wounds until after all of the models in the unit have moved. If this unit has 6 or more models when it makes a charge move, change the mortal wounds inflicted by this ability from 1 to D3.
        Skullhunter 1 model in this unit can be a Skullhunter. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's melee weapons.
        Standard Bearers 1 in every 3 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 2 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Standard Bearers.

        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Skullreaper 5"374+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Daemonforged Weapons If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with this unit's Gore-slick Blades, Daemonblades, Spinecleavers, and Soultearers is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound in addition to any normal damage.
        Icon Bearers 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit whil it includes any Icon Bearers.
        Murderous to the Last Do not take battleshock tests for this unit. In addition, roll a dice each time a model from this unit is slain by an attack made with a melee weapon, before the model is removed from play. ON a 5+ pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of the slain model. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds after all of its attacks have been resolved.
        Skullseeker 1 model in this unit is a Skullseeker. That model is armed with a Vicious Mutation in addition to its other weapons.
        Trial of Skulls You can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by this unit if the target unit has 5 or more models.

        • Slaughterpriest [100pts]

          Selections: 2. Blood Sacrifice, Hackblade & Wrath-hammer

          Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, KHORNE, BLOODBOUND, HERO, PRIEST, SLAUGHTERPRIEST, Leader

          Prayer: -, Blood Bind, Blood Boil, Blood Sacrifice, Unit: Slaughterpriest, Unit Abilities: Scorn of Sorcery, Weapon: Hackblade, Wrath-hammer


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Banner of Wrath In the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 8" of the bearer. On a 4+ that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Widening the Rift Add 8" to the range of the Loathsome Sorcery and Rage of Khorne abilities used by this battalion's BLOODSECRATOR while it is wholly within 8" of any SLAUGHTERPRIESTS from the same battalion.
        Prayer Description Ref
        - In your hero phase, this model can chant one of the following prayers. If he does so, pick one of the prayers and then make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1, this model suffers D3 mortal wounds and the prayer is not answered. On a 2-3 the prayer is not answered. On a 4+ the prayer is answered.
        Blood Bind If this prayer is answered, pick 1 enemy unit within 16" of the model chanting this prayer and not within 3" of any friendly units. Your opponent must move that unit a number of inches equal to the prayer roll. The first model to be moved from that unit must finish the move as close as possible to the closest unit from the chanting model's army. Any remaining models in that unit must finish their move within 1" of a model from their unit that has already been moved, and as close as possible to the closest unit from the chanting model's army.
        Blood Boil If this prayer is answered, pick 1 enemy unit within 16" of the model chanting this prayer. That unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Blood Sacrifice At the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly model that knows this prayer can chant it. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1, the model chanting this prayer suffers 1 mortal wound and the prayer is not answered. On a 2-3, the prayer is not answered. On a 4+ the prayer is answered. If this prayer is answered, pick a KHORNE unit wholly within 8" of the model chanting this prayer. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds and you receive 1 Blood Tithe point.
        Bronzed Flesh At the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly model that knows this prayer can chant it. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1, the model chanting this prayer suffers 1 mortal wound and the prayer is not answered. On a 2-3, the prayer is not answered. On a 4+ the prayer is answered. If this prayer is answered, pick 1 friendly KHORNE unit wholly within 16" of the model chanting this prayer and visible to them. Add 1 to save rolls for that unit until the start of your next hero phase.
        Killing Frenzy At the start of your hero phase, 1 friendly model that knows this prayer can chant it. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice. On a 1, the model chanting this prayer suffers 1 mortal wound and the prayer is not answered. On a 2-3, the prayer is not answered. On a 4+ the prayer is answered. If this prayer is successful, pick either the PRIEST or a KHORNE unit from your army that is within 16" of the PRIEST and which is visible to them. Add 1 to the hit rolls of the unit you picked until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Blood Warrior 5"264+
        Bloodreaver 6"156+
        Bloodsecrator 4"593+
        Slaughterpriest 6"685+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Chaos Champion 1 model in this unit can be a Chaos Champion. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's Goreaxe(s).
        Chieftain 1 model in this unit can be a Chieftain. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model's melee weapons.
        Frenzied Devotion Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons while this unit is wholly within 16" of any friendly KHORNE TOTEMS.
        Gorefists If an unmodified save roll for an attack made with a melee weapon that targets a unit that includes any models armed with a Goreaxe and Gorefist is 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of its attacks have been resolved.
        Hornblowers 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run and charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.
        Icon Bearers 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be an Icon Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Icon Bearers.
        Loathsome Sorcery Re-roll successful casting rolls for WIZARDS within 16" of this model, before any unbinding rolls are made.
        No Respite If a model from this unit is slain in the combat phase, before that model is removed from play, that model can make a pile-in move and then attack wtih all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        Rage of Khorne Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly KHORNE units while they are wholly within 16" of any models with this ability.
        Reaver Blades You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for models attacks made with Reaver Blades.
        Scorn of Sorcery This model can attempt to unbind one spell in the enemy hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD. In addition, this model can attempt to dispel one endless spell at the start of your hero phase in the same manner as a WIZARD.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Bloodbathed Axe Melee2"34+3+-2
        Ensorcelled Axe Melee1"43+3+-11
        Goreaxe Melee1"23+4+-1
        Hackblade Melee1"33+4+-1

        Wrath-hammer Melee3"D34+4+-1

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Selections: Khorne

        Categories: Allegiance, Allegiance: Khorne

        Battle Trait: Blood for the Blood God!, Locus of Fury, Summon Daemons of Khorne, Blood Tithe Table - Points Expended: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, Blood Tithe Table - Unit Summoning: (01) 1 Exalted Greater Daemon of Khorne , (02) 1 Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster, (03) 1 Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage, (04) 1 Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury, (05) 20 Bloodletters, (06) 15 Bloodletters, (07) 10 Flesh Hounds, (08) 3 Bloodcrushers, (09) 1 Skull Cannon, (10) 10 Bloodletters, (11) 1 Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne, (12) 5 Flesh Hounds, (13) 1 Skullmaster, Herald of Khorne, (14) 5 Bloodletters, (15) 1 Bloodmaster, Herald of Khorne


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Blood for the Blood God! You can receive rewards from the Blood Tithe Rewards Table below by using Blood Tithe points. You receive 1 Blood Tithe point each time a unit is destroyed. At the start of the hero phase, you can use 1 or more Blood Tithe points to receive 1 reward from the Blood Tithe Rewards table. Immediately carry out that reward's effect. Each reward costs a number of points as shown on the Blood Tithe Rewards table, and you can only receive a reward if you have enough Blood Tithe points to pay its cost. Note that Blood Tithe points can be spent to receive the Spelleater Curse reward at any point during the hero phase, instead of at the start of the hero phase. If you choose a reward, after resolving its effect your Blood Tithe points total is reset to zero.
        Locus of Fury You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by friendly KHORNE DAEMON units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly KHORNE DAEMON HEROES, or wholly within 16" of any friendly KHORNE GREATER DAEMONS.
        Summon Daemons of Khorne You can summon units of KHORNE DAEMONS to the battlefield by expending Blood Tithe points. If you have 2 or more Blood Tithe points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon one unit from the list below onto the battlefield, and add it to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of Blood Tithe points to pay its cost. If you summon a unit in this manner, your Blood Tithe points total is reset to zero immediately after the unit has been set up (you cannot save any Blood Tithe points you did not use). Units summoned in this way must be set up wholly within 12" of a friendly KHORNE HERO or SKULL ALTAR and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Blood Tithe Table - Points Expended Reward Ref
        1 Bloody Exemplar: You receive 1 command point.
        2 Spelleater Curse: Choose this reward immediately after a WIZARD has cast a spell anywhere on the battlefield, before any attempts to unbind that spell are made. That spell is not successfully cast.
        3 Murderlust: Pick 1 friendly KHORNE unit; that unit can make a normal move. If it is within 12" of an enemy model, it can either make a normal move or attempt to make a charge move.
        4 Apoplectic Frenzy: Pick 1 friendly KHORNE unit within 3" of an enemy unit. That KHORNE unit can make a pile-in move and then attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        5 Brass Skull Meteor: Pick 1 unit anywhere on the battlefield, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, roll a dice for each unit within 8" of that unit; on a 3+ the unit being rolled for suffers 1 mortal wound. On a 6, the unit being rolled for suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        6 Relentless Fury: Until your next hero phase, each time a friendly KHORNE model is slain in the combat phase, before the model is removed from play, it can make a pile-in move and then attack with all of the melee weapons it is armed with.
        7 Crimson Rain: You can choose this reward once per battle. Immediately after you do so, and at the start of each of your subsequent hero phases, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to each friendly KHORNE unit on the battlefield.
        8 Slaughter Triumphant: You can choose this reward once per battle. After you do so, if the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a friendly KHORNE unit is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound roll and save roll for each hit.
        Blood Tithe Table - Unit Summoning Cost Ref
        (01) 1 Exalted Greater Daemon of Khorne 16
        (02) 1 Wrath of Khorne Bloodthirster 8
        (03) 1 Bloodthirster of Insensate Rage 8
        (04) 1 Bloodthirster of Unfettered Fury 8
        (05) 20 Bloodletters 7
        (06) 15 Bloodletters 6
        (07) 10 Flesh Hounds 6
        (08) 3 Bloodcrushers 5
        (09) 1 Skull Cannon 5
        (10) 10 Bloodletters 4
        (11) 1 Herald of Khorne on Blood Throne 4
        (12) 5 Flesh Hounds 4
        (13) 1 Skullmaster, Herald of Khorne 3
        (14) 5 Bloodletters 2
        (15) 1 Bloodmaster, Herald of Khorne 2

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

    • Malign Sorcery [140pts]

      • Judgement: Bleeding Icon [40pts]

        Categories: Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Bleeding Icon, Unit Abilities: Crushing Retribution, Drifting Menace, Fly, Sigil of Doom


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Bleeding Icon 4+If this judgement roll is successful, set up this model wholly within 8" of the performing KHORNE PRIEST.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Crushing Retribution After this model has moved, each unit that has any models it passed across, and each other unit that is within 1" of it at the end of its move, suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Drifting Menace When this judgement is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it. In addition, at the start of each of their subsequent hero phases, the player who set this judgement up can make a move with it if it is still on the battlefield. When you move this judgement, it can move up to 8" and can fly.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Sigil of Doom If a unit fails a battleshock test within 3" of any models with this ability, add D3 to the number of models that flee. This ability has no effect on KHORNE units.

      • Judgement: Hexgorger Skulls [40pts]

        Categories: Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Hexgorger Skulls, Unit Abilities: Compelled by Hate, Fly, Hexgorgers


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Hexgorger Skulls 3+If successfully performed set up both Hexgorger Skull models within 6" of each other and wholly within 8" of that KHORNE PRIEST.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Compelled by Hate When this judgement is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it. In addition, at the start of each of their subsequent hero phases, the player who set this judgement up can make a move with it if it is still on the battlefield. When you move this judgement, it can move up to 8" and can fly. Both models from this judgement must finish any move within 6" of each other.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Hexgorgers Subtract 2 from casting rolls for WIZARDS while they are within 12" of any Hexgorger Skulls models. In addition, if a WIZARD attempts to cast a spell while it is within 12" of both models from the same Hexgorger Skulls Judgement of Khorne, and the casting roll is an unmodified 8, then that casting attempt is not successful, that WIZARD no longer knows that spell, and each WIZARD within 12" of that Judgement of Khorne suffers D6 mortal wounds.

      • Judgement: Wrath-Axe [60pts]

        Categories: Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Wrath-Axe, Unit Abilities: Flung With Fury, Fly, Hatred's Edge, Reality Cleaved


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Wrath-Axe 5+If the judgement roll is successful, set up this model wholly within 8" of the performing KHORNE PRIEST.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Flung With Fury When this judgement is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it. In addition, at the start of each of their subsequent hero phases, the player who set this judgement up can make a move with it if it is still on the battlefield. When you move this judgement, it can move up to 8" and can fly.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Hatred's Edge After this model has moved, roll a dice for each unit that has any models it passed across. On a 2+ that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Then the player that set up this model picks 1 enemy unit within 3" of this model and rolls a dice (the enemy unit may be one that this model passed across). On a 2+ that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Reality Cleaved Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by units within 3" of this model. This ability has no effect on KHORNE units.

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6. (Core Rules p3)

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll. (Core Rules p3)

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase. (Core Rules p3)
